title: DOES RIOT EVEN DO ANYTHING ABOUT TROLLS IN RANKED GAMES!??!?!
body: Hello, I have played so many games where the adc or any role in ranked unjustly decides to troll. This last game, was a person going kaisa, their kaisa got taken so they picked vayne (they were last pick mind you) I was third pick on our team, I went xerath since pyke was banned and it was a kaisa I could poke her. Their support was a koz, then finally our adc picked Vayne into koz and kaisa (he should have went ez but ignored all advice). During the game I was poking their adc and supp with q and our adc was taking all the hits from koz, like i said they would if they went vayne into their comp, and then our adc decides that I was griefing our lane by staying back and poking and decides to leave me alone bot facing adc and supp (something I can handle as xerath once I get more mana) but then settles in middle lane and feeds their yasuo. I reported this person the FACT is Riot never does anything about them, EVER. I get them Nearly EVERY GAME.  The summoner name of this person is PredatorNA. They even said "I have no problem running it down"

replies.body: Guaranteed this "troll" was fed up with you telling them what champion they should have picked.

Jesus, I almost never get trolls. Its such a rare occurence for me. Something must be off about what your perception of a troll is. Are you in iron/bronze? Like, are you sure theyre not just bad players? (Im talking about in general, since you said nearly every game you have trolls)

Are you ragging on people constantly maybe? Theres a lot of people with low tolerance for anonymous strangers shit talking them, so they often do things in game to spite the person talking shit. This seems more the case given your description. Im not saying their trolling is justified, but for your own sake, stop telling people how to play. You will get much less trolls, like me. (Hopefully)

Or just for the joy of throwing a game. I've also gotten a main account permabanned because I yelled at a person who was trolling, inting and costing us the game. A jungler and top who just sat in the jg hiding doing nothing. I yelled at them (not cursing mind you) and I got banned. And then they run around and no accountability for them. BECAUSE RIOT

Once again to receive account punishment outside of hate speech you have to receive consistent reports with majority of these not reflected on your reform card. 

If you want an accurate tally of your reported frequency you can submit a ticket to receive this information. 

You can try and deflect the problem but punishments are rolled out to 1% of the community not by chance but because of your actions. Actions that the majority of the league community deams not appropriate. That is how the automated system works it uses our own data through reports to determine what is or what is not acceptable.

Ahh, didn't realize was against the rules. I read the "summoners code" if that's still up to date and doesn't mention any of that. Also, I didnt do anything or say anything to him and yet he was that way so that assumption is false, course you can say its accurate given the "usually" part of the statement (way to protect yourself from the cold reality of trolls). Also, my games usually end in wins even if they troll :D I am just sick of having them troll with no repercussions.
There is little to do, reviewing games for trolls takes too much time to be feasible, especially with the vast number of people reporting anything they dont like as trolling.

yes they do something about trolls
but the amount is... laughable.

i mean im not trying to give riot shit in the regard that trolling DOES require manual reviews to make sure. someone going 0/17/58 still did a good job id say. 

but the amount of games played, its just unrealistic to manual review even 10% of them.

still the fact that riot is like "yes we agree, so we just do nothing unless we're really bored then we review like 1 game a day" is something that pisses me off.
